name: Upload
description: `Value.Upload` is a value component for displaying a list of files.

props.name: download
props.doc: Causes the browser to treat all listed files as downloadable instead of opening them in a new browser tab or window. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: displaySize
props.doc: Can be used to display the file size of the file. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: value
props.doc: The value to format. Can be given as `children` instead.

props.name: format
props.doc: Formatting options for the value when variant is `text`. See the [Intl.ListFormat](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl/ListFormat/ListFormat) documentation.

props.name: variant
props.doc: Defines if the value should be displayed in list format (`ol`, `ul`) or regular text format in one line. Defaults to `text`.

props.name: listType
props.doc: Defines the type of list styling used for list variants. Used together with variant `ol` and `ul`. Variant `ol`: `a`, `A`, `i`, `I` and `1`. Variant `ul`: `circle`, `disc` and `square`. Defaults to `undefined`.

props.name: inside
props.doc: Defines the position of the marker.

props.name: outside
props.doc: Defines the position of the marker (default).

props.name: nested
props.doc: Will ensure a nested structure of several lists.

props.name: innerRef
props.doc: Send along a custom React Ref.

events.name: onFileClick
events.doc: Will be called once a file gets clicked on by the user. Access the clicked file with `{ fileItem }`.
